overview: Sudheendran who is a photographer by profession . He gets a chance in films as an assistant cameraman, with help from his friend Rafeeque.In the meantime it's learnt that Sudheendran has a talent in script-writing. However, Sudheendran somehow gets into trouble, and with that things take a new turn. It's the dreams of this photographer-turned-assistant cameraman that forms the plot of Decent Parties.
title: Decent Parties
